events.title: Registrations Open
events.description: Team registration opens for universities across Sri Lanka. Form your team of 3 students and find a faculty coach to register.

events.title: Registrations Close
events.description: Registration deadline for teams. Make sure to complete your registration before this date to secure your spot in the competition.

events.title: Online Round
events.description: An online preliminary round to help teams prepare and get familiar with the contest format.

events.title: Sri Lanka Onsite Regional
events.description: The main national contest held onsite. This is where history will be made as Sri Lanka hosts its first-ever ICPC contest!
actions: Champion team advances to World Finals
Five runner-up teams qualify for Asia West Regional

events.title: ICPC Asia West Regional
events.description: Five runner-up teams from Sri Lanka will represent the country at the ICPC Asia West Regional Contest.
actions: Compete with top teams from Asia West

events.title: ICPC World Finals
events.description: The ultimate destination - compete with the world's best programming teams at the ICPC World Finals.
